subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: P. K. Subban had a goal and assist Tuesday, giving him 6 points in this second-round matchup, as Montreal beat Boston, 4-2, to take a two-games-to-one series lead.
snippet: P. K. Subban had a goal and assist Tuesday, giving him 6 points in this second-round matchup, as Montreal beat Boston, 4-2, to take a two-games-to-one series lead.
